title: Breakingviews TV: Taxing tech
text:
Breakingviews TV: Taxing tech Wednesday, March 21, 2018 - 04:15 
Liam Proud and Richard Beales discuss the EU’s idea of taxing the revenue of digital businesses like Alphabet and Facebook, because profit made in the virtual world is hard to map to specific jurisdictions in the real world. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Liam Proud and Richard Beales discuss the EU’s idea of taxing the revenue of digital businesses like Alphabet and Facebook, because profit made in the virtual world is hard to map to specific jurisdictions in the real world.
